title: why google don't care about the dongle and usb-c earphones problem in Pixel2!!
content:
the dongle which i got with the phone with no reason stoped working and when i bought new one when i plug it i get massage sais that the device connected isn't compatible whith my mobile...so i bought usb-c huawei headphones and it give the same last massage
and it turned out that almost every Pixel2 users suffering same problem
we need software update really bad
